name: mrhonaramoz-13azar-1- behbod codha - behbod file excell-behbod tasavir- taghirat podemanha va nomarat
description: A comprehensive classroom management web application designed with a mobile-first approach. Features include class registry (Modular/Term), student management, attendance tracking, behavioral scoring, grade management, and data visualization using Recharts. Integrated with Gemini for generating lesson plans.
